title: Mali, Canada mining giant end gold complex dispute
description:
Canadian giant Barrick and Mali announced Monday they had reached an agreement ending their dispute over one of the world's largest gold complexes, as the country's economy grinds to a halt under a jihadist fuel blockade. Mali, Canada mining giant end gold complex dispute
